content: 1 cat amigurumi pattern by yaymbo cat amigurumi pattern by yaymbo please note that you do not have the permission to copy sell or redistribute the pattern in any way you have the permission to sell finished products made from this pattern as long as you give credit to the designer 2 cat amigurumi pattern by yaymbo what you need  blue yarn white yarn black yarn yellow yarn and a piece of red yarn  hook i used a 3mm hook with caron simply soft  fiberfill  yarn needle  stitch marker optional this pattern works in continuous rounds i m using blue yarn for the body but you can use any other color of your choice abbreviations us  single_crochet single_crochet  double_crochet double_crochet  st stitch  increase increase  decrease decrease  chain chain  slip_stitch slip_stitch  round round please note that you do not have the permission to copy sell or redistribute the pattern in any way you have the permission to sell finished products made from this pattern as long as you give credit to the designer 3 cat amigurumi pattern by yaymbo head between them and embroider the mouth on rounds 14-16 with a piece of red yarn in blue yarn embroider a heart shaped nose round 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 round 2 increase 6x 12 ears make two round 3 single_crochet increase 6x 18 in blue yarn round 4 2sc increase 6x 24 round 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 round 5 3sc increase 6x 30 round 2 6 single_crochet 6 round 6 4sc increase 6x 36 round 3 2sc increase 2x 8 round 7 5sc increase 6x 42 round 4 3sc increase 2x 10 round 8-15 42 single_crochet 42 round 5 4sc increase 2x 12 round 16 5sc decrease 6x 36 round 6 5sc increase 2x 14 round 17 4sc decrease 6x 30 fasten_off leaving a tail sew the ears on round 18 3sc decrease 6x 24 the head round 19 2sc decrease 6x 18 fasten_off leaving a tail stuff the head legs and body with a piece of black yarn embroider the start in white yarn eyes on rounds 11-13 with 4 stitches please note that you do not have the permission to copy sell or redistribute the pattern in any way you have the permission to sell finished products made from this pattern as long as you give credit to the designer 4 cat amigurumi pattern by yaymbo round 1 5 single_crochet in magic_ring 5 round 31 5sc increase 6x 42 round 2 increase 5x 10 round 32 42 single_crochet 42 round 3-5 10 single_crochet 10 change to black yarn alternate the black and white yarn change to blue yarn and stuff as you go round 6-13 10 single_crochet 10 round 14 4 single_crochet decrease 4 single_crochet 9 round 15-18 9 single_crochet 9 round 19 decrease 7 single_crochet 8 round 20-22 8 single_crochet 8 round 23 3 single_crochet decrease 3 single_crochet 7 round 24-25 7
